result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey T Allen

defendant.name: Allen, Jeffrey T
defendant.address: 304 Waboos Circle P.O. Box 714, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538

records.addlTxt:
10:17 AM Defendant Jeffrey T Allen in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Robert N Forseth appeared by video for Jeffrey T Allen.  Attorney Dennis G Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. State calls Officer Heath Karaba from the Lac du Flambeau Tribal Police Department. Sworn in and provides testimony. Witness identifies the defendant Jeffrey Allen. Cross examination of the witness. Redirect from state. State/Defense rests. State/Defense makes arguments. Court finds probable cause. State to file information. Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

9:13 AM Defendant Jeffrey T Allen in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Robert N Forseth appeared by video for Jeffrey T Allen.  Attorney Karl Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense acknowledges receipt of criminal complaint. Waives reading. Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 10:15 am.

11:12 AM Defendant Jeffrey T Allen in court, in custody without counsel.  DA Karl Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Public Defender Office is eligible and still looking for attorney representation.  Courtney Jolin appears specially and advises court still looking for counsel and status is unknown. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:59 AM Defendant Jeffrey T Allen in court, in custody without counsel.  Attorney Dennis G Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Shawl appears in court specially for the Public Defender's Office.  Attorney Shawl notes that the PD is appointing counsel.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 10:15 am.

1:38 PM Defendant Jeffrey T Allen appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dennis G Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of complaint. Court reads charges. Defendant has not yet contact public defender but intends to.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Not to operate a motor vehicle, Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises, Curfew set from 9 pm - 6pm seven days a week. 
22-007528

1:23 PM Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  DA Karl Hayes appears for the State of Wisconsin.  No complaint filed yet.  DA Hayes speaks to the incident that occurred that resulted in the defendant's arrest. Court finds probable cause for purposes of this bond hearing.  Bond set at $1,000 with conditions: Not to operate a motor vehicle, Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises, Curfew set from 9 pm - 6pm seven days a week.  Bond form.
Adjourned order to show cause hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
